title: The.Shield.Season.3.HQ.x264.ac3.subs-MCH
description:
This is a high quality, full resolution, high profile x264 DVD rip of The Shield - Season 3 (of 7).

I couldn't find any high quality rips out there, so I thought others might appreciate a higher quality, as this show deserves such.  I believe this was originally aired on the F/X channel.  Has some of the same writers as the excellent F/X show, Sons of Anarchy.  I'm not too into cop shows in general, but this was some great TV.

The original DVD's are kind of grainy/noisy, so the file size had to be increased to maintain a good quality (CRF).  And a weak denoiser filter was run to clean it up a bit.  These files may be a little large for some.  But if you aren't worried about space, and want a higher quality, to output to a t.v. or such, then this is for you.  I've previewed the episodes and they look and sound great on a 50 inch LCD/surround sound system.

The Shield
Season 3 of 7, Episodes 1-15

Source: DVD Rip
Average file size: 600mb

Container: MKV
Video: x264

Audio: English, AC3 Dolby Digital

Subtitles: English subrip srt in MKV. (note: you can turn subs on or off)

The rest of the seasons should be uploaded soon.
Hope you enjoy!!

Please seed when you are done...a good rule of thumb is to upload at least as much as you've downloaded (1 to 1 ratio)...thanks!
